mapper.select: select so.*, so2.office_name as office_name, so2.office_thumbnail as office_thumbnail from so_order so, so_officeinfo so2 where so.office_no = so2.office_no and order_no = #{order_no}
select sr.* from so_order so , so_rental sr where so.order_no = sr.order_no and so.order_no = #{order_no}
select so.* from so_order so , so_rental sr where so.order_no = sr.order_no and sr.rental_no = #{rental_no}

select * from so_order so, so_member sm where so.member_no = sm.member_no
and sm.member_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and so.order_no = #{searchKeyword}
and (sm.member_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or so.order_no = #{searchKeyword})
order by so.order_no desc
select so2.* from so_order so , so_officeinfo so2 where so.office_no = so2.office_no and so.order_no = #{order_no}

select count(*) as cnt, so.office_no, sum(sr.rental_price) as totalPrice, so.office_approve_date from so_officeinfo so, so_order so2, so_rental sr where so.office_no = so2.office_no and so2.order_no = sr.order_no and so.member_no = #{member_no} group by so.office_no
